title: Project-Based Engineering Design Education Course Utilizing Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational engineering knowledge and project management experience
context.additional_context: Training for current practitioners, emphasizing applicability to actual work tasks

learning_goals: Learners can perform stage-based tasks (problem definition, concept generation, detailed design) in the engineering design process using collaborative learning strategies
Learners can apply effective communication and conflict management skills within teams to achieve over 80% project completion rates
Learners can visually represent design outcomes using smartphone-based tools and incorporate peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
